content: What is the relationalist understanding of causality? Are causes and consequences always dual to one another? What's the take of the "Geneva School"? For instance, here's a paper that shows duality between state and properties: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1355219898000331
Is that saying one can replace it with the triadic relation that @Jon Awbrey likes to talk about?
2 messages were moved here from #learning: questions > Beginner questions by Matteo Capucci (he/him).
